queries.query:
-- claim jobs update "{prefix}Jobs" set claimed_by = @claimed_by, claim_token = @claim_token, invisible_until = @invisible_until, attempt = attempt + 1 where row_id = ( select row_id from "{prefix}Jobs" where scheduled_for <= @now and invisible_until <= @now order by invisible_until limit 1 ) and invisible_until <= @now;
-- get claimed row select row_id, job_id, scheduled_for, payload, attempt from "{prefix}Jobs" where claimed_by = @claimed_by and claim_token = @claim_token limit 1;
-- keep job claim update "{prefix}Jobs" set claim_token = null, invisible_until = @invisible_until where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- complete job delete from "{prefix}Jobs" where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- forget job delete from "{prefix}Jobs" where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- retry job update "{prefix}Jobs" set claimed_by = null, claim_token = null, invisible_until = @invisible_until where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
